guide.defaultMessage:
### I'm ChatAI, your intelligent assistant. How can I help you today? ### 
I can help you with writing copy, editing drafts, brainstorming ideas, chatting, and answering questions.
If you need customized content, click on `+` to create a custom assistant.

qa.q06: Concepts of LLM, Agent, Prompts, and GPTs?
qa.q07: How to design a custom assistant?
qa.q08: Is there a cloud service version available?
qa.q09: Does it support local language models?
qa.q10: Does it support image recognition and generation?
qa.q11: Does it support speech synthesis and speech recognition?
qa.q12: Does it support a plugin system?
qa.q13: Is there a marketplace to access GPTs?
qa.q14: Does it support multiple AI service providers?
qa.q15: What should I do if I encounter problems while using it?

pickAgent: Or choose from the following agent templates

slogan.desc1: Further refined, exceedingly intelligent, and overflowing with innovation.
slogan.desc2: Create your first smart agent, let's get started!
slogan.title: Your Brainpower
